function.name: flip
function.description: Flips the image verticaly (type param=0) or horizontaly (type param=1). A new JSImage is returned.
function.summary: Flips the image verticaly (type param=0) or horizontaly (type param=1).
function.sample: var image = plugins.images.getImage(byteArray_or_file_or_filename);//loads the image image = image.flip(0);//flip vertically var bytes = image.getData();//gets the image bytes plugins.file.writeFile('filename',bytes);//saves the image bytes

function.name: getContentType
function.description: Gets the contenttype (image/jpeg) of this image.
function.summary: Gets the contenttype (image/jpeg) of this image.

function.name: getData
function.description: Gets the bytes of this image, so that they can be saved to disk or stored the database.
function.summary: Gets the bytes of this image, so that they can be saved to disk or stored the database.
function.sample: var image = plugins.images.getImage(byteArray_or_file_or_filename);//loads the image image = image.resize(200,200);//resizes it to 200,200 var bytes = image.getData();//gets the image bytes plugins.file.writeFile('filename',bytes);//saves the image bytes

function.name: getHeight
function.description: Gets the height of this image.
function.summary: Gets the height of this image.

function.name: getMetaDataDescription
function.description: Gets the description of a metadata property from the image. Currently only jpg is supported.
function.summary: Gets the description of a metadata property from the image.

function.name: getMetaDataObject
function.description: Gets the real object of a metadata property from the image. Currently only jpg is supported.
function.summary: Gets the real object of a metadata property from the image.

function.name: getMetaDataProperties
function.description: Gets the available metadata properties from the image. Currently only jpg is supported.
function.summary: Gets the available metadata properties from the image.

function.name: getWidth
function.description: Gets the width of this image.
function.summary: Gets the width of this image.

function.name: resize
function.description: Resizes the image to the width/height given, keeping aspect ratio. A new JSImage is returned.
function.summary: Resizes the image to the width/height given, keeping aspect ratio.
function.sample: var image = plugins.images.getImage(byteArray_or_file_or_filename);//loads the image image = image.resize(200,200);//resizes it to 200,200 var bytes = image.getData();//gets the image bytes plugins.file.writeFile('filename',bytes);//saves the image bytes

function.name: rotate
function.description: Rotates the image the number of degrees that is given. A new JSImage is returned.
function.summary: Rotates the image the number of degrees that is given.
function.sample: var image = plugins.images.getImage(byteArray_or_file_or_filename);//loads the image image = image.rotate(90);//rotate the image 90 degrees var bytes = image.getData();//gets the image bytes plugins.file.writeFile('filename',bytes);//saves the image bytes

function.name: createJPGImage
function.description: Creates a javascript image from the given bean/applet/form_element.
function.summary: Creates a javascript image from the given bean/applet/form_element.

function.name: createJPGImage
function.description: Creates a javascript image from the given bean/applet/form_element.
function.summary: Creates a javascript image from the given bean/applet/form_element.

function.name: getImage
function.description: Get a javascript image/resource object for the given file/bytearray/bean/applet/form_element.
function.summary: Get a javascript image/resource object for the given file/bytearray/bean/applet/form_element.
